CRYPTDISK_START(8)
==================
Jonas Meurer <jonas@freesources.org>


NAME
----
cryptdisks_stop - wrapper around cryptsetup which parses /etc/crypttab.


SYNOPSIS
--------
*cryptdisks_stop* '<name>'

    
DESCRIPTION
-----------
*cryptdisks_stop* is a wrapper around *cryptsetup* which parses */etc/crypttab* just like the initscript /etc/init.d/cryptdisks
does, and stops the dm-crypt mapping which corresponds to '<name>'.


SEE ALSO
--------
'cryptsetup'(8), 'crypttab'(5)


AUTHOR
------
This manual page was written by Jonas Meurer <mejo@debian.org> in January 2008.
